short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension adds a set of useful features to Github Gists

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Copying file contents in Github gists can be tedious. this extension will add a copy button on each file header to help users copy the content of that file by simply clicking a button!

Report issues or Request for features:
https://github.com/farskid/gist-copy-button-extension
